title: my account got stall last 2 weeks and i got banned parmnetly
body:
i lost my account last  2 weeks i couldnt log in into my account i thouhgt that was from the updating servers or updating game data so i tried for the next day and i couldnt log in either so....last 4 days i think or 5 something like that i dont remember  i tried again to chick and i got acciese to my account that mean i could log in my account but i got this masseges that i got banned paremnt for something i didnt do while i spend 900$ on this account and called samih35 
please please help me and there is some pic from the messages

replies.body: It looks like that account was banned for chat toxicity. If you don't remember getting a reform card when you login, you can always reach out to the player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
